description: Try our easy to follow Vanilla Custard recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Custard sauce,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Vanilla Custard Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place cream, vanilla seeds and pod in a saucepan. Stir over medium heat and bring just to the boil. Remove from heat and set aside for 5 minutes for the flavour to infuse. Remove pod.

Meanwhile, whisk egg yolks, sugar and cornflour to combine. Gradually whisk in the warm cream until smooth. Strain back into the saucepan and stir over low heat for 3-4 minutes or until thickened and coats the back of a wooden spoon. Serve custard warm or chilled.
